pr_title: Issue 5144: Force token refresh when segment store indicates token expiry

timeline.message:
Add a test

Signed-off-by: Ravi Sharda <ravi.sharda@emc.com>

Token expiry signaling changes and tests

Signed-off-by: Ravi Sharda <ravi.sharda@emc.com>

Remove commented lines.

Signed-off-by: Ravi Sharda <ravi.sharda@emc.com>

timeline.bodyText: TokenExpirySignal has a higher priority and hence should be checked before returning a token right ?
timeline.author: shrids

replies.bodyText: If the token has no expiry time set on it, the signal wouldn't be interpreted as token having been expired. Therefore, we do this check before the check for the signal.
replies.author: ravisharda

timeline.author: shrids

replies.bodyText: Thanks. I've pushed the fix in the latest commit.
replies.author: ravisharda
